difficulty.typhoon.name: Typhoon
difficulty.typhoon.description:
<r>The maximum challenge.</c>
The planet is a nightmare, survival is merely an illusion.
Nobody has what it takes.

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: The <y>Executioner</c> is a mobile fighter who specializes in counting heads. Using Ion projectors, the Executioner fabricates illusions which cause foes to run away in fear, while also projecting an axe to take out the strongest enemies. Make sure to chain kills with <y>Ion Burst</c> and <y>Execution</c> to keep the damage pouring.

nemesisCommando.name: Nemesis Commando
nemesisCommando.description: The <y>Nemesis Commando</c>'s origins are unknown, but something is clear, he's no longer who he once was.
nemesisCommando.endQuote: ..and so he left, carrying new sense of humanity within.

executionerX.name: Ion Burst
executionerX.description:
Rapidly shoot ionized bullets for <y>320% damage</c> each.
Gain bullets by slaying enemies.

executionerC.name: Crowd Dispersion
executionerC.description:
<y>Dash forward, fearing nearby enemies</c>.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while dashing.

executionerV.name: Execution
executionerV.description:
Launch into the air, and slam down with a projected axe for <y>1000% damage.</c>
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

executionerVBoosted.name: Crowd Execution
executionerVBoosted.description:
Launch into the air, and slam down with a projected axe for <y>1500% damage,</c> <b>fearing enemies.</c>
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

nemesisCommandoZ.name: Blade of Cessation
nemesisCommandoZ.description:
Cut through nearby enemies for <y>120% damage</c>, <r>wounding</c> them for 6 seconds. <r>Cannot be stacked</c>.
<r>Wounded</c> enemies take an extra <y>50% damage</c> from <b>all sources.</c>

nemesisCommandoX.name: Single Tap
nemesisCommandoX.description:
Shoot an enemy for <y>150% damage</c>.
<b>Hold up to 4.</c> Reload <b>2</c> charges when <b>rolling</c>.

nemesisCommandoC.name: Tactical Roll
nemesisCommandoC.description:
Quickly <y>roll forward</c> a short distance.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while rolling. <b>Hold up to 2.</c>

nemesisCommandoV.name: Flush Out
nemesisCommandoV.description:
Throw a <y>grenade</c> for <y>700% damage</c>. Hold to <b>cook</c> the grenade.
Press the <b>down</c> direction to <y>toss</c> at a low arc instead.

nemesisCommandoV2.name: Devastator
nemesisCommandoV2.description:
Fire a rocket for <y>1000% damage</c> to a single enemy. Surrounding enemies take <y>50% damage</c> and are <y>stunned</c>.
If used <b>airborne</c>, fire <y>downwards</c> at an angle.

armedBackpack.name: Armed Backpack
armedBackpack.pickup: Chance of firing a bullet behind you.
armedBackpack.description: <y>18.5%</c> <c_stack>(+6.5% per stack)</c> chance on attack to <y>fire a bullet</c> behind you for <y>150% damage</c>.
armedBackpack.story:
Being secure is always important. I don't want you to get in trouble, so please wear this whenever you go out. 'Specially in the canyons, there's a lot of thieves there!
I'll send you some extra ammunition later this year, alright?

brassKnuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
brassKnuckles.pickup: Deal extra damage at close range.
brassKnuckles.description: Deal <y>+35% damage</c> to enemies within <y>5m</c> <c_stack>(+2.5 per stack)</c>.
brassKnuckles.story:
We found this at the crime scene. We need to check for DNA against the rest of the evidence. I still cant believe they got away.
The back has some kind of symbol, maybe that could give us a clue. I'll be heading to the west of [REDACTED], I know someone who can help us solve the case.

detritiveTrematode.name: Detritive Trematode
detritiveTrematode.pickup: Low health enemies receive damage over time.
detritiveTrematode.description: Enemies <y>below 10% </c> <c_stack>(+5% per stack) <y>health</c> become <y>infected</c>, receiving <y>2% of max health</c> damage per second.
detritiveTrematode.story:
Eh, this is yours.
Don't send one of those weird microscopic egg hatcheries EVER again, please.

dormantFungus.name: Dormant Fungus
dormantFungus.description: Regenerates <g>2%</c> <c_stack>(+2% per stack)</c> of your health every two seconds while <g>moving</c>.
dormantFungus.story:
When you commanded me to explore the fungal caves all I expected to find was.. well, fungi, of course. Though I wasn't excited by any means, this specimen caught my eye.
It seems to only grow around flowing water, and ever since I collected and contained this sample, both the colouration and the smell faded out quickly.

I hope you can study it further.

fork.name: Fork
fork.destination:
Antima Building - Rooftop,
Blossom Hills,
Earth
fork.story:
Surprise! A fork! Hahaha!!!
You said any gift was a good gift, HERE YOU GO! Jokes aside, this fork is magical. Trust me Duncan, I once got to eat a salad with it and later that same day I found a cent!
Also uh please come play with us someday soon, we miss destroying your build in SS2 (please tell me you changed your main, lol).

watchMetronome.name: Watch Metronome
watchMetronome.pickup: Standing still charges speed for your next movement.
watchMetronome.description: Standing still <b>increases movement speed</c> by up to <b>+85%</c>. Decays over <b>3 seconds</c> <c_stack>(+3 per stack)</c>.
watchMetronome.story:
Grandpa gave me this as a relic of the past. He says it belonged to our great-great-great-great-great grandfather. I couldn't care less about antiques and family belongings so I think it's best if you have it instead.
Not like it's of any use anyways..

wonderHerbs.name: Wonder Herbs
wonderHerbs.description: Increases <g>healing</c> from all sources by <g>12%</c> <c_stack>(+12% per stack)</c>.
wonderHerbs.story:
Rikka! I heard you're working with the EC on making a new recipe. Here at the farm we've been growing some special herbs which we think may come handy. They're known for being very, very useful for treating physical and emotional wounds.
If you need some more don't hesitate to call me! XOXO
- Eden

coffeeBag.name: Coffee Bag
coffeeBag.pickup: Activating an interactable boosts movement and attack speed.
coffeeBag.description: Activating an interactable <y>increases movement and attack speed</c> by <b>22%</c> for <b>10 <c_stack>(+5 per stack) <b>seconds</c>.
coffeeBag.story: Sleeeeeeeeeeepyheaaaaaaaaaaaaaaad idk why u say u dont like coffee its so gooooood for staying up. ik ik theres other other ways to get hyped but oh boy i think u will dig this one, its my favorite!!! give it a try before yelling at me mmkay?

x4Stimulant.name: X4 Stimulant
x4Stimulant.pickup: Decrease secondary skill cooldown, and heal slightly when using it.
x4Stimulant.description: Decrease your <b>secondary skill cooldown</c> by <b>10%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>. Using your secondary skill increases <g>health regeneration</c> by <g>2 <c_stack>(+1 per stack) <g>hp </c>per second for 3 seconds.
x4Stimulant.destination:
Romeo 33,
Batang Ai National Park,
Earth
x4Stimulant.story:
Encased, including manual. Does the machine show symptoms of a 540? If so you may want to avoid using above 100ml of stimulant.

Cheers.

moltenCoin.name: Molten Coin
moltenCoin.pickup: Chance to ignite enemies on hit and gain gold
moltenCoin.description: <y>6%</c> chance on hit to <y>incinerate enemies for 6 seconds, dropping $1 <c_stack>(+$1 per stack)<y> gold</c>.
moltenCoin.story:
Hey! Uh, I'm sorry, I'm really sorry.. I know you really wanted me to keep this coin but I can't take the responsibility any more..
See, I accidentally put the coin at the edge of a plasma furnace so.. well.. it's a bit burnt on the side, please don't get mad at me..

crypticSource.name: Cryptic Source
crypticSource.pickup: Changing direction creates bursts of energy.
crypticSource.description: Changing movement direction fires <y>chain lightning</c> for <y>70% <c_stack>(+55% per stack)<y> damage</c> on up to <y>2</c> targets.
crypticSource.story: From atoms to sentient beings, everything comes from energy. However, this rather cryptic object seems to emanate energy on its own. High amounts of friction seem to trigger a chain reaction which makes it highly unstable. However, it may also be a manipulable source of (infinite?) energy. Whether this will lead us to the utopian future we crave for is completely uncertain, but this completely changes our previous thoughts about the universe.

huntersSigil.name: Hunter's Sigil
huntersSigil.pickup: Standing still increases armor and critical strike chance.
huntersSigil.description: After standing still for 1 second, gain <b>15 <c_stack>(+10 per stack)<b> armor</c> and <y>25% <c_stack>(+20% per stack)<y> critical chance</c>.
huntersSigil.story:
Hey Sett, welcome to the club. We've been looking for candidates and now that you're with us, we can begin working next season. We're counting on you.

-Irix out

strangeCan.name: Strange Can
strangeCan.description: <y>8.5% <c_stack>(+5% per stack)</c> chance on hit to <y>intoxicate</c> an enemy, dealing up to <y>40% of enemy health</c> as <y>damage over time</c>.
strangeCan.story:
These are as delicious as I told you. I just hope it doesn't crack open on the way there like the last one.
I should get a job...

roulette.name: Roulette
roulette.pickup: Roll a random buff every minute.
roulette.description:
Gain a <y>random buff</c>, which gets <b>rerolled every minute</c>. Possible buffs:

<spr RouletteBuffs 1>: Increase <g>max health</c> by <g>60 <c_stack>(+24 per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 2>: Increase <g>health regeneration</c> by <g>3.6 <c_stack>(+1.8 per stack) <g>hp</c> per second.
<spr RouletteBuffs 3>: Increase <y>base damage</c> by <y>14 <c_stack>(+5 per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 4>: Increase <y>attack speed</c> by <y>35% <c_stack>(+15.5% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 5>: Increase <y>critical chance</c> by <y>25% <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 6>: Increase <b>movement speed</c> by <b>20% <c_stack>(+7% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 7>: Increase <b>armor</c> by <b>35 <c_stack>(+14 per stack)</c>.
roulette.story: Replacement Roulette model 144Bella-1 in follow-up to the recent events that unfolded in the casino. For further inquiries, please contact us at the E-direction given by our representatives.

judderingEgg.name: Juddering Egg
judderingEgg.description: Hatch <b>1 <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> <b>young wurm</c> who fights with you, periodically <y>attacking surrounding enemies</c> for <y>18x80% damage</c>.
judderingEgg.story:
Another one from the breeder, this time it's a very strange specimen.
Be extremely cautious, I've heard juveniles can become highly aggressive (and lethal!) in a matter of seconds if you don't handle them correctly. Shouldn't be too long before it hatches, so you better have the structure ready for it.
